item.title: ‘Crypto Week’ Is Underway. Here Are 3 Reasons Business Owners Should Take Note
item.description: House Republicans are making big moves in their mainstreaming of cryptocurrency.

item.title: Nvidia’s Influence Over the Entire Stock Market Keeps Growing
item.description: Nvidia now accounts for nearly 8% of the S&P 500.

item.title: Vibe Coding Is the Future of Programming. Here’s How Your Company Can Get on Board
item.description: Advancements in AI mean that people can create software just by describing it. Consider this your vibe coding primer.

item.title: ‘Click-to-Cancel’ Is Over, but There Are Other Ways to Unsubscribe
item.description: An FTC rule would have made it easier for people to avoid being charged for auto-renewals. It was halted.

item.title: 10 Black Swan Events That Could Disrupt Your Business by 2030
item.description: Don’t get blindsided—these potential crises could crush your growth strategy if you’re not ready.
